articles.description:
Re @SharonJebitok @Victorebukaezea Hi there, to provide some clarity on this:
Developer DAO did this as a one-off courtesy for a small number of members who were eligible for the initial token launch. But this is not an ongoing service that we are able to provide, unfortunately.
We caution all to be careful 🙏

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Balaji Srinivasan
How do you distinguish a fly-by-night DAO from one that is motivated by something more than money?
Real communities are dense subgraphs. 
Verifiable, unique humans within the community should be much more likely to follow other community members than random accounts.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Cami (🐱, ⛽️)
I recently joined @fuellabs_ and talked about my ideological alignment with the mission: making blockchains accessible through innovation in scaling compute.
Fuel's approach is a modular design. This is a newer concept. 
Here are the best resources for understanding modular🔎👇
Fuel Labs: Today, we're proud to announce $80M of support led by @BlockchainCap and @StratosXYZ!
Fuel is the fastest Modular Execution Layer delivering the highest flexible throughput with maximum security guarantees for the Ethereum ecosystem.
 https://fuel-labs.ghost.io/fuel-labs-announces-80-million-of-support-for-the-fastest-modular-execution-layer/
